snippet.title: Game Gear Longplay [028] Sonic the Hedgehog
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Sonic the Hedgehog is a video game franchise created by Sega and starred for their mascot Sonic. This is a longplay of game Sonic The Hedgehog, from Game Gear. A good 8-bit version of these great character. Includes all bonus stages and all chaos emeralds.

Green Hill Zone: 01:17
Bridge Zone: 08:09
Jungle Zone: 17:11
Labyrinth Zone: 24:24
Scrap Brain Zone: 32:36
Sky Base Zone: 40:14 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
